Descriptions.ShortDescription: Exports metrics to an InfluxDB 2.x instance
Descriptions.LongDescription:
InfluxDB Exporter is a NINA plugin that transmits periodic hardware, guiding, and image metrics to an InfluxDB time-series database. From there, the metrics may be graphed using tools such as Grafana or InfluxDBâ€™s own built-in graphing features.

# Getting help #

Help for this plugin may be found in the **#plugin-discussions** channel on the NINA project [Discord chat server](https://discord.gg/nighttime-imaging) or by filing an issue report at this plugin's [Github repository](https://github.com/daleghent/nina-influxdb-exporter/issues).
